text: Gianluca Galimberti (born 30 May 1968 in Cremona) is an Italian professor and politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party and he was elected Mayor of Cremona on 8 June 2014 and took his office on 10 June. He has been re-elected for a second term in 2019. ==References== ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *2019 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Cremona ==External links== * * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Cremona Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians
title: Gianluca Galimberti
